para.sentence: For large \rho , with \ell and \eta fixed, {H^{\pm}_{\ell}}\left(\eta,\rho\right)=e^{\pm\mathrm{i}{\theta_{\ell}}\left( \eta,\rho\right)}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(a\right)_{k}}{\left(b\right)_ {k}}}{k!(\pm 2\mathrm{i}\rho)^{k}}, where {\theta_{\ell}}\left(\eta,\rho\right) is defined by (33.2.9), and a and b are defined by (33.8.3).

With arguments (\eta,\rho) suppressed, an equivalent formulation is given by F_{\ell}=g\cos{\theta_{\ell}}+f\sin{\theta_{\ell}},G_{\ell}=f\cos{\theta_{\ell}}-g\sin{\theta_{\ell}}, F_{\ell}'=\widehat{g}\cos{\theta_{\ell}}+\widehat{f}\sin{\theta_{\ell}},G_{\ell}'=\widehat{f}\cos{\theta_{\ell}}-\widehat{g}\sin{\theta_{\ell}}, {H^{\pm}_{\ell}}=e^{\pm\mathrm{i}{\theta_{\ell}}}(f\pm\mathrm{i}g), where f\sim\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}f_{k},g\sim\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}g_{k}, \widehat{f}\sim\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\widehat{f}_{k},\widehat{g}\sim\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\widehat{g}_{k}, g\widehat{f}-f\widehat{g}=1.

Here f_{0}=1 , g_{0}=0 , \widehat{f}_{0}=0 , \widehat{g}_{0}=1-(\eta/\rho) , and for k=0,1,2,\dots , f_{k+1}=\lambda_{k}f_{k}-\mu_{k}g_{k},g_{k+1}=\lambda_{k}g_{k}+\mu_{k}f_{k},\widehat{f}_{k+1}=\lambda_{k}\widehat{f}_{k}-\mu_{k}\widehat{g}_{k}-(f_{k+1}/ \rho),\widehat{g}_{k+1}=\lambda_{k}\widehat{g}_{k}+\mu_{k}\widehat{f}_{k}-(g_{k+1}/ \rho), where \lambda_{k}=\frac{(2k+1)\eta}{(2k+2)\rho},\mu_{k}=\frac{\ell(\ell+1)-k(k+1)+\eta^{2}}{(2k+2)\rho}.
